snippet: The former head of the California State Cemetery Board, hailed last year as a hero for helping people deal with mismanagement at local cemeteries, has now been accused of mismanagement himself.         The state auditor, Kurt R. Sjoberg, said an i...
lead_paragraph: The former head of the California State Cemetery Board, hailed last year as a hero for helping people deal with mismanagement at local cemeteries, has now been accused of mismanagement himself. The state auditor, Kurt R. Sjoberg, said an investigation began with an tip in April, months before Ray Giunta and his staff found evidence of corpses having been mishandled at Southern California cemeteries.

headline.main: The Accuser Is Now Accused in Cemetry Case
